SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Group_ INNER JOIN SO_FavoriteSite ON (Group_.groupId = SO_FavoriteSite.groupId) WHERE (SO_FavoriteSite.userId = ?) AND (lower(Group_.name) LIKE ? OR lower(Group_.name) LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL)

SELECT DISTINCT SO_FavoriteSite.userId, SO_FavoriteSite.groupId, Group_.name FROM Group_ INNER JOIN SO_FavoriteSite ON (Group_.groupId = SO_FavoriteSite.groupId) WHERE (SO_FavoriteSite.userId = ?) AND (lower(Group_.name) LIKE ? OR lower(Group_.name) LIKE ? OR ? IS NULL) ORDER BY Group_.name ASC
